description: Use of front forecourt as car wash a retention of the associated structure (Retrospective Planning Permission)
decision_conditions: The proposed structure by reason of its poor unsympathetic design and appearance, together with a prominent location would detrimentally impact on the character of the site, streetscene and surrounding residential area contrary to policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); policies 7.4-7.6 of the Consolidated London Plan (2015); the adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (2012); and National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The use of the site as a car wash and occupation of the adopted highway is considered to give rise to congestion, detrimental to the free flow of traffic and adversely comprise highway safety, contrary to policies 6.3, 6.11, 6.12, 6.13 and 7.15 of The London Plan (Consolidated 2016), polices 6.13 and 7B of Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
